Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Diversey
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Diversey due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Diversey due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
